attributes.action: Let students wear their own clothes more often in schools.
attributes.additional_details: Schools have a strict uniform policy where students aren't allowed to express themselves. We aren't allowed to paint our nails, dye our hair and wear our own clothes. Schools may have a couple of days  where students can where their own clothes but that's usually 2 days per year and it's unfair.
attributes.background: All schools must have 3 or more days per week where students can wear their own clothes instead of the uniform.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition we currently have open on a similar topic:

Require schools to make uniform optional
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608259
